sql.name: queryXhCapitalOverdueList
sql.sqlString: select a.BANK_NAME,/*银行名称*/ a.BANK_NUMBER,/*银行账号*/ a.BANK_OPEN,/*银行开户行*/ a.DAMAGES_MONEY,/*违约金*/ a.LENDER_ID,/*借款人ID*/ a.LENDER_ID_CARD,/*借款人身份证号*/ a.LENDER_NAME,/*借款人名称*/ a.LENDER_NUMBER,/*借款编号*/ a.OVERDUE_DATE,/*逾期时间*/ a.OVERDUE_MONEY,/*逾期金额*/ a.OVERDUE_STATR,/*逾期状态*/ a.PUNISH_INTEREST,/*罚息*/ a.SPARE_FIELD01,/*备用字段1*/ a.SPARE_FIELD02,/*备用字段2*/ a.SPARE_FIELD03,/*备用字段3*/ a.ID from XH_CAPITAL_OVERDUE a where 1=1 $sql
